casebody.data:
No. 09-513. Jim Henry Perkins, et al., Petitioners v. Department of Veterans Affairs, et al. 559 U.S. 991, 130 S. Ct. 1755,

176 L. Ed. 2d 212,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 2237. March 8, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eleventh Circuit denied.

Same case below, 572 F.3d 868.
